title: Pope age comparisons
description: With the passing of Pope Francis, the Washington Post charted the ages ofâ€¦Tags: pope, Washington Post
author: Nathan Yau
excerpt: With the passing of Pope Francis, the Washington Post charted the ages of past popes during their pontificate. Pope Francis was 88 years old, making him the second oldest to Pope Leo XIII in 1903.
text: With the passing of Pope Francis, the Washington Post charted the ages of past popes during their pontificate. Pope Francis was 88 years old, making him the second oldest to Pope Leo XIII in 1903.
